name: Match3 (Nicolas Vogelbusch)
description:
This is a small game made in a week by Nicolas Vogelbusch. The theme was Gift. The idea behind this game was, to gift a game to Person we love. I Chose my Mother who is addicted to CandyCrush and i tryed to make a Matche 3 clone. 

Course:  Game a Week 

Professor:  Csongor Baranyai 

Game Design :  Nicolas Vogelbusch

 Coding: Nicolas Vogelbusch 

Art:  Nicolas Vogelbusch 

Gametester:  Robin Struss
